There is a small airport at Kuruman, but there are

scheduled airline flights, only charter flights. The closest cities with scheduled flights are Kimberly and Upington, both approximately 250km from Kuruman.

You can catch a bus to Kuruman

.

There is no train station in Kuruman.

value: content=The Guesthouse on Main, in its relaxing garden setting, is located just  and is close to restaurants, convenience stores, petrol stations and fast food outlets.  There is ample off-street parking. Each room has a fridge, kettle, a 54cm television with satellite channels and are air-conditioned. Each suite has its own entrance. A hearty breakfast is served in the morning.
